data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
In Cincinnati a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 1, Maikel Van der Werff gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cincinnati.
Free kick Chicago.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Chicago throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
In the minute 5, Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Cincinnati.
Throw-in for Chicago at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Chicago in Cincinnati.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 11, Cincinnati are caught offside.
Throw-in for Chicago in the half of Cincinnati.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In the minute 14, Fabian Herbers (Chicago) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Siem de Jong for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 18, In Cincinnati Chicago attack through Miguel Navarro. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
Free kick for Chicago in the half of Cincinnati.
In the minute 22, Chicago to take a throw-in in Cincinnati territory.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 24, Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Marcos De Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 25, Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Chicago in the half of Cincinnati.
Chicago's Miguel Navarro misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 27, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cincinnati.
Can Cincinnati capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chicago's half?
In Cincinnati Cincinnati drive forward through Adrien Regattin. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 29, Cincinnati have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Chicago.
Chicago drive upfield and Alvaro Medran gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cincinnati defender.
In the minute 31, Robert Beric (Chicago) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Cincinnati surge into the attack at Nippert Stadium but Adrien Regattinâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Cincinnati.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Cincinnati needs to be cautious. Chicago have an attacking throw-in.
Robert Beric for Chicago gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Ball safe as Cincinnati is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
In Cincinnati a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 41, Marcos De Oliveira signals a throw-in for Chicago, close to Cincinnati's area.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Cincinnati are pushing forward but Joseph-Claude Gyau's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 43, Chicago have a goal kick.
Cincinnati are coming forward and Siem de Jong gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cincinnati.
Marcos De Oliveira will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Alvaro Medran for Chicago is back on the field again.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Cincinnati is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, The match at Nippert Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alvaro Medran, who is down injured.
Marcos De Oliveira has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Chicago awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Chicago.
Free kick for Cincinnati in the half of Chicago.
In the minute 48, Marcos De Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Chicago at Nippert Stadium.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 49, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Mathieu Deplagne.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Chicago.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 52, Mathieu Deplagne is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Chicago close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Cincinnati.
In the minute 54, Marcos De Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Adrien Regattin for Cincinnati who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 55, Cincinnati's Adrien Regattin is back in action after a slight knock.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
Jurgen Locadia for Cincinnati drives towards goal at Nippert Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Cincinnati throw-in in Chicago's half.
In the minute 59, Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Corner awarded to Chicago.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 62, Chicago have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In the minute 62, Raphael Wicky is making the team's first substitution at Nippert Stadium with Djordje Mihailovic replacing Fabian Herbers.
Raphael Wicky (Chicago) is making a second substitution, with Elliot Collier replacing Przemyslaw Frankowski.
Jonathan Bornstein is replacing Miguel Navarro for Chicago at Nippert Stadium.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Chicago awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Allan Cruz (Cincinnati) has replaced the possibly injured Adrien Regattin.
In the minute 63, The home team have replaced Siem de Jong with Yuya Kubo. This is the second substitution made today by Jaap Stam.
Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
In the minute 66, Chicago's Ignacio Aliseda breaks free at Nippert Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
Free kick Cincinnati.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Cincinnati in the half of Chicago.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
In the minute 72, Cincinnati push forward at Nippert Stadium and Frankie Amaya gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Chicago defence.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cincinnati.
In the minute 73, Marcos De Oliveira signals a Chicago throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
Throw-in for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
Chicago's Djordje Mihailovic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Chicago just outside Cincinnati's area.
In the minute 76, The home team have replaced Greg Garza with Andrew Gutman. This is the third substitution made today by Jaap Stam.
Robert Beric is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Cincinnati to check on Kendall Waston, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 82, Kendall Waston has recovered and rejoins the match in Cincinnati.
Chicago's Robert Beric looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in the half of Chicago.
In the minute 82, Chicago have a goal kick.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Chicago a goal kick.
Can Cincinnati get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
In the minute 84, Marcos De Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Chicago have a dangerous throw-in.
Attention is being given to Cincinnatiâ€™s Haris Medunjanin and play has been suspended briefly.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In the minute 86, Caleb Stanko (Cincinnati) has replaced the possibly injured Haris Medunjanin at Nippert Stadium.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 87, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Cincinnati drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
At Nippert Stadium the fourth official shows that 8 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Chicago capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cincinnati's half?
Chicago to take a throw-in in Cincinnati territory.
Throw-in for Chicago in the half of Cincinnati.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In Cincinnati a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Chicago at Nippert Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
Chicago's Elliot Collier breaks free at Nippert Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
Marcos De Oliveira waits before resuming play because Mauricio Pineda for Chicago is still down.
The away team has substituted Mauricio Pineda with Wyatt Omsberg. Raphael Wicky is thus making his fourth change.
Mathieu Deplagne (Cincinnati) gets a yellow card.
Jonathan Bornstein (Chicago) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
